TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EditorZoneBase extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone
Public MustInherit Class EditorZoneBase Inherits ToolZone

summary.span: 作为所有区域控件的基类，这些区域控件是 控件的容器。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个专用的区域类继承自类，并提供一组基本的行为的派生区域包含控件。The class is a specialized zone class that inherits from the class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain controls. 有几种其他类型的类; 有关详细信息，请参阅概述主题面向类。There are several other types of classes; for more information, see the overview topic for the class. 其他工具和区域一样，页处于正常浏览模式时，区域不可见; 它们是可见页面时才编辑显示模式下显示。Like other tool zones, zones are not visible when a page is in normal browse mode; they are visible only when a page is in edit display mode. 此外喜欢的其他工具区域区域只能包含它们的设计目的包含的控件的特殊类型 (在这种情况下，控件)。Also like the other tool zones, zones can only contain the special type of controls they were designed to contain (in this case, controls). 区域为它们所包含的编辑控件提供一个特殊的 UI。The zones provide a special UI for the editing controls they contain. 许多这些 UI 元素是普遍适用于 Web 部件控件集内的所有区域。Many of these UI elements are common to all zones in the Web Parts control set. 有关 Web 部件区域中的常见 UI 元素的详细讨论，请参阅类概述主题面向类。For a detailed discussion of the common UI elements in Web Parts zones, see the class overview topic for the class. 因为类是抽象的不能直接在网页上使用它。Because the class is abstract, you cannot use it directly on a Web page. 相反，必须使用继承的控件类并实现其行为。Instead, you must use a control that inherits from the class and implements its behavior. 你可以使用派生的区域中 Web 部件控件集，提供控件，或者可以派生自己的自定义控件。You can either use the derived zone that is provided in the Web Parts control set, the control, or you can derive your own custom control. 类提供了常见用户界面 (UI) 来包含特殊的控件，使最终用户能够编辑属性、 布局、 外观、 和的其他属性控件。The class provides a common user interface (UI) to contain special controls that enable end users to edit the properties, layout, appearance, and other attributes of controls. 适用于 UI 的某些属性指谓词，如， ，和属性。Some properties that apply to the UI refer to verbs, such as the , , and properties. 谓词是由用户在页面上，执行的常见操作，并在 UI 中由按钮、 链接、 菜单项或其他元素表示。Verbs are common actions carried out by users on a page, and are represented in the UI by buttons, links, menu items, or other elements. 例如，当用户编辑控件上的属性时他们可以单击应用谓词以保存所做的更改。For example, when users edit properties on a control they can click an apply verb to save the changes. 多个其他属性会影响在编辑 UI 中的各种位置显示的文本。Several other properties affect text that is displayed at various points in the editing UI. 其中包括， ， ，和属性。These include the , , , and properties. 两个重要属性提供对相关控件的引用。Two important properties provide references to related controls. 属性是一系列该区域中包含的控件。The property is a collection of the controls contained in the zone. 属性是对中包含的控件的对象引用-这可能有点控件或任何其他 ASP.NET 服务器控件、 用户控件或当前正在编辑的自定义控件。The property is an object reference to a control contained in a --which might be a control or any other ASP.NET server control, user control, or custom control currently being edited. 最后，属性引用的实例对象关联的区域，并包含外围 UI 元素 （称为 chrome） 如标题和边框样式的样式特征该区域中的控件。Finally, the property references an instance of an object that is associated with the zone, and that contains style characteristics of the peripheral UI elements (known as chrome) such as title and border styles for controls in the zone. 方法数类专门用于处理其他控件的编辑。A number of the methods of the class are specialized to handle the editing of other controls. 方法可更改编辑显示模式返回到正常浏览视图页。The method changes the page from the edit display mode back to a normal browsing view. 方法是用于创建 chrome （即外围 UI 元素，如边框、 谓词、 图标和标题） 环绕每个区域中的控件。The method is for creating the chrome (peripheral UI elements such as a border, verbs, icons, and a title) that surrounds each control in the zone. 方法是一个抽象方法，派生的类重写它创建的所有实例该区域中包含的控件。The method is an abstract method; derived classes override it to create instances of all the controls contained in the zone. 如果可以由派生类调用方法的集合中某些编程的原因，标志设置重新创建和更新的集合的 Web 部件控件的区域更改控件控件。The method can be called by a derived class if the collection of controls in the zone changes for some programmatic reason, which flags the Web Parts control set to recreate and update the collection of controls. 方法用于设置的集合控件添加到`null`时编辑模式中的显示模式更改回浏览模式。The method is used to set the collection of controls to `null` when the display mode changes from edit mode back to browse mode. 最后，方法用于处理事件时控件进入或离开编辑模式。Finally, the method is used for handling the event when a control is either entering or leaving edit mode. 例如，此方法是同步的属性值的一个便利位置控件中关联的可编辑值控件。For example, this method is a convenient place to synchronize the property values of a control with the editable values in the associated controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了几个声明性，并以编程方式使用的类。The following code example demonstrates several declarative and programmatic uses of the class. 因为此类是抽象的这些代码示例使用的派生附带了 Web 部件控件集，演示的属性和它所继承的方法的类类。Because the class is abstract, the code examples use the derived class that ships with the Web Parts control set, demonstrating the properties and methods that it inherits from the class. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使你能够更改的用户控件在网页上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 包含的 Web 页面控件。A Web page that contains an control. - 自定义类，该类演示的一些类成员。A custom class that demonstrates some of the class members. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。A description of how the example works in a browser. 用户控件的源代码来自另一个主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 若要运行此代码示例，对于需要获取从用户控件的.ascx 文件[演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主题，并在此代码示例中的.aspx 页所在的文件夹中的文件的位置。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 代码示例的第二部分是一个网页，其中包含声明性引用控件。The second part of the code example is a Web page that contains a declarative reference to an control. 页面顶部附近是`Register`指令的用户控件。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive for the user control. 用户控件标记声明中包含的页``元素。The user control tag is declared in the page with a `` element. 请注意，下面``元素是``元素，其中包含控件，并具有各种标记和设置属性，以确定其外观和行为。Notice that below the `` element is an `` element that contains controls, and has a variety of tags and properties set to determine its appearance and behavior. 大多数页面中的代码演示的各种编程使用属性和方法。Most of the code in the page demonstrates the various programmatic uses of the properties and methods. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#1)] 代码示例的第三部分是一个自定义类，用于说明如何使用多种类成员。The third part of the code example is a custom class that shows how to work with a number of the class members. 自定义类派生自，以便它可以用于在区域模板中的 Web 页的声明性标记。The custom class derives from so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译;因此，您将注意到， `Register` Web 页的顶部附近的指令不引用程序集文件。This code example uses dynamic compilation; thus, you will notice that the `Register` directive near the top of the Web page does not reference an assembly file. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#12)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#12)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以选择**编辑模式**从下拉列表切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** from the drop-down list to switch to edit mode. 可以单击谓词菜单 （向下箭头） 之一的两个控件的标题栏中，单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the two controls, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 当编辑 UI 是可见、 您所见的各种声明性效果和以编程方式使用的类成员。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the effects of the various declarative and programmatic uses of the class members.

para.span: 如果你想要开发一个自定义区域，以便承载控件，您必须确定您是否想要提供区域模板支持。

span.span: If you want to develop a custom zone for hosting controls, you must determine whether you want to provide zone template support.

para.span: 在区域模板创建的实现的类型接口，并且如果你想要启用页面开发人员能够使用自定义区域来引用是必需的您 Web 页的声明性标记中的区域中的控件。

span.span: A zone template is created by types that implement the interface, and is necessary if you want to enable page developers using your custom zone to reference controls within your zone in the declarative markup of a Web page.

para.span: 如果您需要区域模板支持，则应从继承类。

span.span: If you need zone template support, you should inherit from the class.

para.span: 与此相反，如果自定义区域并将其控件要用作独立的并将不带任何选项的页面开发人员在区域模板中，以声明方式指定控件以编程方式创建它们，然后您可以直接继承从类。

span.span: In contrast, if your custom zone and its controls are going to be self-contained, and they will be created programmatically without any options for page developers to specify controls declaratively in a zone template, then you can inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 如果这样做，是关键是要实现方法，以便将工作自定义区域。

span.span: If you do this, it is critical that you implement the method so that your custom zone will work.

related.span: 演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化该类供继承的类实例使用。

span.span: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.

summary.span: 此构造函数只能由继承的类调用。

span.span: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数，由继承的类，调用时将传递对象传递给控制，使页后，可以显示编辑用户界面 (UI)。This constructor, when invoked by an inherited class, passes a object to the control, which enables the page to display the editing user interface (UI).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ApplyVerb As WebPartVerb

summary.span: 获取对 对象的引用，该对象使最终用户能够在编辑模式下应用对控件所做的编辑更改。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that enables end users to apply editing changes to a control in edit mode.

value.span: 允许最终用户应用对控件所做的更改。

span.span: A that enables end users to apply changes to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由引用应用谓词控件上的属性派生自类。The apply verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 应用谓词将保存编辑最终用户编辑的用户界面 (UI) 中所做的更改到当前正在编辑的服务器控件。The apply verb saves editing changes that an end user has made in the editing user interface (UI) to a server control that is currently being edited. 默认情况下，应用谓词显示在 UI控件。By default, the apply verb appears in the UI as a control. 按钮的类型可以是图像、 链接或实际的按钮;您可以设置此谓词的所有按钮 （而不是适用于各个按钮） 区域中通过设置继承在区域级别的属性。The type of button can be an image, a link, or an actual button; you can set this for all verb buttons in a zone (not for individual buttons) by setting the inherited property at the zone level. 应用谓词是区域级别的控件，这意味着尽管可能存在多个控件，每个处于编辑模式的服务器控件的一个或多个属性应用谓词发挥普遍应用所有中的所有更改到服务器控件的区域中的控件。The apply verb is a zone-level control, which means that although there might be several controls, each editing one or more properties for the server control that is in edit mode, the apply verb works universally to apply all changes from all the controls in the zone to the server control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性声明的方式和以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何访问以声明方式在网页中的属性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此示例中自定义的谓词的文本。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何访问属性以编程方式，通过使用切换按钮来启用或禁用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#4)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以选择**编辑模式**要切换到编辑模式下的下拉列表控件中。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 可以单击其中一个控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头），单击**编辑**编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当控件和编辑 UI 可见时，会看到表示应用谓词，然后单击的按钮**切换应用谓词启用**按钮启用或禁用它。When the control and editing UI are visible, you can see the button that represents the apply verb, and click the **Toggle ApplyVerb Enabled** button to enable or disable it.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CancelVerb As WebPartVerb

summary.span: 获取对 对象的引用，该对象使最终用户能够取消在编辑模式下对控件所做的编辑更改。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that enables end users to cancel editing changes to a control in edit mode.

value.span: 允许最终用户取消对控件所做的编辑更改。

span.span: A that enables end users to cancel editing changes to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消谓词由控件上的属性派生自类。The cancel verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 取消谓词取消编辑最终用户具有对编辑的用户界面 (UI) 中的服务器控件所做的更改。The cancel verb cancels editing changes that an end user has made to a server control in the editing user interface (UI). 默认情况下，取消谓词显示在 UI控件。By default, the cancel verb appears in the UI as a control. 按钮的类型可以是图像、 链接或实际的按钮;您可以设置此谓词的所有按钮 （而不是适用于各个按钮） 区域中通过设置继承在区域级别的属性。The type of button can be an image, a link, or an actual button; you can set this for all verb buttons in a zone (not for individual buttons) by setting the inherited property at the zone level. 当用户取消编辑更改，没有在更改控制应用于所编辑的服务器控件。When a user cancels editing changes, none of the changes in the controls are applied to the server control that is being edited. 此外，页面将保留在编辑显示模式，但控件处于隐藏状态和已编辑的控件不再处于选中状态。In addition, the page remains in edit display mode, but the controls are hidden and the control that was being edited is no longer selected. 这允许最终用户选择另一个控件，以编辑而无需更改再次显示模式。This allows an end user to select another control to edit without having to change display modes again. 取消谓词是区域级别的控件，这意味着，尽管可能存在多个控件，每个处于编辑模式的服务器控件的一个或多个属性的取消谓词发挥全局撤消全部更改从所有区域中的控件。The cancel verb is a zone-level control, meaning that while there might be several controls, each editing one or more properties for the server control that is in edit mode, the cancel verb works universally to cancel all changes from all the controls in the zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性声明的方式和以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何访问以声明方式在网页中的属性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此示例中自定义的谓词的文本。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何访问属性以编程方式，通过使用切换按钮来启用或禁用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#5)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以选择**编辑模式**要切换到编辑模式下的下拉列表控件中。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 可以单击其中一个控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头），单击**编辑**编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当控件和编辑 UI 可见时，会看到表示取消的谓词，然后单击的按钮**切换 CancelVerb 启用**按钮启用或禁用它。When the control and editing UI are visible, you can see the button that represents the cancel verb, and click the **Toggle CancelVerb Enabled** button to enable or disable it.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 用户在区域的页眉中单击关闭谓词便可以调用此方法，此方法一经调用，就会结束编辑 控件的过程，并使 Web 部件页的显示模式返回到浏览模式。

span.span: Called when a user clicks a close verb in the header of a zone, this method ends the process of editing controls, and returns a Web Parts page's display mode to browse mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供的实现中的基方法声明为类。The method provides an implementation for the base method declared in the class. 实现仅调用方法，执行结束编辑过程所需的步骤。The implementation simply calls the method, which carries out the steps necessary to end the editing process. 调用方法返回页后，可以浏览模式，并取消任何所做的任何编辑更改控件。Calling the method returns the page to browse mode, and cancels any editing changes made to any controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void CreateChildControls() cil managed

summary.span: 创建与 区域关联的子控件集。

span.span: Creates the set of child controls associated with an zone.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome CreateEditorPartChrome() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function CreateEditorPartChrome () As EditorPartChrome
abstract member CreateEditorPartChrome : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome override this.CreateEditorPartChrome : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome

summary.span: 获取对新的 对象的引用，该对象用于呈现 区域周围的外围用户界面 (UI) 元素。

span.span: Gets a reference to a new object used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements around an zone.

returns.span: 为区域呈现外围 UI 元素的 。

span.span: An that renders the peripheral UI elements for the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个新对象。The method returns a new object. Chrome 包括以下的外围用户界面元素括住每个单独区域中的控件： 边框; 标题栏显示在标题栏中，包括可选图标、 标题文本和谓词菜单; 以及中显示项的项控件的页脚区域。Chrome includes the following peripheral UI elements that surround each individual control in the zone: a border; a title bar; the items that appear within the title bar, including optional icons, title text, and a verbs menu; and items appearing in the footer area of a control. 方法使用返回对象来创建 chrome 绕每一个控件。The method uses the returned object to create the chrome around each control.

para.span: 可以提供不同的实现派生类中重写方法。

span.span: The method can be overridden in a derived class to provide a different implementation.

para.span: 例如，您可以创建自定义类为您提供更好地控制呈现和编辑用户界面的外观。

span.span: For example, you might create a customized class to give you more control over the rendering and appearance of the editing UI.

para.span: 如果重写派生的区域中的方法，您可以创建您的自定义中重写的方法的对象。

span.span: If you override the method in a derived zone, you could create your custom object in the overridden method.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function CreateEditorParts () As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 提供一个基方法声明，派生的区域可以重写该声明，以便处理创建 控件的详细信息，这些控件包含在某个区域中。

span.span: Provides a base method declaration that derived zones can override to handle the details of creating the controls contained in a zone.

returns.span: 包含 控件集合的 ，这些控件与区域关联。

span.span: An that contains the collection of controls associated with the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不提供任何实现。The method provides no implementation. 它旨在在派生类中实现，因此应创建的集合的实例控件包含在区域中，无论何时在宿主网页进入编辑模式。It is intended to be implemented in a derived class, and should be used to create an instance of the collection of controls contained in a zone, whenever the hosting Web page enters edit mode. 方法提供的实现的一个示例方法。The method provides one example of an implementation of the method.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

value.span: 如果 当前正在显示，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the is currently displayed; otherwise, .
The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EditorPartChrome As EditorPartChrome

summary.span: 获取对 类的实例的引用，该类与 区域关联。

span.span: Gets a reference to the instance of the class associated with the zone.

value.span: 对于某个区域中 控件的 chrome 元素，包含其样式属性的 。

span.span: An that contains style characteristics for the chrome elements of controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对引用与区域关联的对象。The property provides a reference to the object associated with a zone. 当方法调用时，它创建的实例类与此实例使用的所有呈现外围用户界面 (UI) 元素 （也称为 chrome）区域中的控件。When the method is called, it creates an instance of the class, and this instance is used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements (also called the chrome) for all controls in the zone. 个人的 chrome 元素控件在其标头区域中的，如谓词、 图标和标题文本，以及其页脚区域和及其包含的元素包括其边框和其他项。The chrome elements for an individual control include its border and other items in its header area, such as verbs, icons, and title text, as well as its footer area and its included elements.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EditorParts As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 获取 区域中包含的所有 控件的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all the controls contained in an zone.

value.span: 包含某个区域中所有单个 控件的 。

span.span: An that contains all the individual controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对所有的集合的引用区域中的控件。The property provides a reference to a collection of all the controls in the zone. 它将同时引用提供与 Web 部件控件集，以及任何自定义控件控件添加到的区域。It references both the controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and any custom controls that are added to the zone. 因为集合是只读的开发人员希望创建自定义控件的常规编辑并将其添加到集合应重写方法。Because the collection is read-only, developers who want to create custom controls for general editing purposes and add them to the collection should override the method. 如果您设计自定义来编辑特定于控件控件，则应重写的成员界面--方法和属性--在控件。If you design custom controls to edit a specific control, you should override the members of the interface--the method and the property--in the control. 若要重写这些成员的原因是为了启用您要创建自定义控件控制并将其添加到集合时正在编辑您的控件，并编辑控件提供的对象引用到他们正在编辑的控件。The reason to override these members is to enable your control to create the custom controls and add them to the collection when your control is being edited, and to provide the editing controls with an object reference to the control they are editing. 如果你想要添加自定义控件，以编辑不会继承从一个服务器控件类，必须实现接口的类中，就像为控件。If you want to add a custom control to edit a server control that does not inherit from the class, you must implement the interface in the class just as you would for a control. > [!NOTE] > 请注意的任何添加到的集合的实现中的控件方法必须具有分配给其 ID 属性的值，否则将集合分配给时引发异常属性。Note that any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 代码示例的第一部分演示属性包含对所有引用Web 页中以声明方式引用的控件。The first part of the code example demonstrates that the property contains references to all the controls that are referenced declaratively in the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 以编程方式访问的代码示例的第二部分属性，并在每个控件的 ID 列出控件。The second part of the code example programmatically accesses the property and lists the ID of each control in a control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#6)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以单击**显示编辑器部件集合**按钮以列出所有的 Id控件中引用属性。When you load the page in a browser, you can click the **Display EditorParts Collection** button to list the IDs of all the controls referenced in the property.

exception.span: 要添加到集合的 的 ID 属性尚未赋值。

span.span: An being added to the collection does not have a value assigned to its ID property.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 获取或设置要在编辑用户界面 (UI) 顶部显示的区域级错误消息的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of a zone-level error message to display at the top of the editing user interface (UI).

value.span: 包含错误消息的本地化字符串。

span.span: A localized string that contains the error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含可以在呈现控件派生自过程中发生错误时显示在 UI 中的错误消息文本类。The property contains the text of an error message that can be displayed in the UI if an error occurs while rendering controls derived from the class. 在该区域的顶部显示错误消息，如果出错时中的任何单个该区域中包含的控件。The error message is displayed at the top of the zone if an error occurs in any of the individual controls contained in the zone. 此外，单个控件可以显示自己收到一个错误在控件附近的错误消息。In addition, individual controls can display their own error messages near the control that receives an error. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void InvalidateEditorParts() cil managed

summary.span: 将与 区域关联的 控件集合设置为 ，从而调用 方法重新创建集合。

span.span: Sets the collection of controls associated with an zone to , which results in the method being called to recreate the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果可以由派生类调用方法的列表与关联控件出于某种原因，更改区域，并且派生的类需要获取的更新的列表控件。The method can be called by derived classes if the list of controls associated with an zone has changed for some reason, and the derived class needs to get an updated list of controls. 派生的类应调用，后者设置当前集合`null`。The derived class should call , which sets the current collection to `null`. 下一次访问集合时，会自动设置的 Web 部件控件调用方法来创建更新后的集合。The next time that the collection is accessed, the Web Parts control set automatically invokes the method to create the updated collection.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LoadViewState(object savedState) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub LoadViewState (savedState As Object)

span.span: The previously saved state.

summary.span: 为某个区域加载以前保存的状态信息。

span.span: Loads previously saved state information for a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法重写基方法，以检查是否因为在区域中单击确定谓词、 取消谓词或应用谓词正在加载页面。The method overrides the base method to check whether the page is being loaded because an OK verb, a cancel verb, or an apply verb was clicked in the zone. 如果是这样，该方法将处理与每个相应方案关联的状态。If so, the method handles the state associated with each respective scenario.

exception.span: 对象的大小与当前视图状态对象的大小不相等。

span.span: The size of the object does not equal the size of the current view-state object.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property OKVerb As WebPartVerb

summary.span: 获取对 对象的引用，该对象将应用在编辑模式下对控件所做的编辑更改，并隐藏编辑用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that applies editing changes to a control in edit mode, and hides the editing user interface (UI).

value.span: 应用对控件所做的编辑更改，并隐藏编辑 UI 的 。

span.span: A that applies editing changes to a control and hides the editing UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用的确定谓词控件上的属性派生自类。The OK verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 当用户单击它时，它将应用用户具有对服务器控件的编辑更改，它是类似于应用谓词。It is similar to the apply verb, in that when a user clicks it, it applies editing changes that the user has made to a server control. 此外，将隐藏编辑控件， （它允许用户编辑另一个控件），将不再选择已编辑的控件和页面仍然处于编辑模式。In addition, the editing controls are hidden, the control that was being edited is no longer selected (which allows the user to edit another control), and the page remains in edit mode. 默认情况下，确定谓词出现在作为 UI控件。By default, the OK verb appears in the UI as a control. 按钮的类型可以是图像、 链接或实际的按钮;您可以设置此谓词的所有按钮 （而不是适用于各个按钮） 区域中通过设置继承在区域级别的属性。The type of button can be an image, a link, or an actual button; you can set this for all verb buttons in a zone (not for individual buttons) by setting the inherited property at the zone level. 确定谓词是区域级别的控件，这意味着，尽管可能存在多个控件，每个处于编辑模式的服务器控件的一个或多个属性的确定谓词发挥普遍要从所有应用的所有更改在区域中，以及隐藏区域本身除外的所有控件的控件。The OK verb is a zone-level control, meaning that while there might be several controls, each editing one or more properties for the server control that is in edit mode, the OK verb works universally to apply all changes from all the controls in the zone, and to hide all the controls except for the zone itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性声明的方式和以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 代码示例的第一部分演示如何访问以声明方式在网页中的属性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此示例中自定义的谓词的文本。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何访问以编程方式，通过使用切换按钮来启用或禁用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#7)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以选择**编辑模式**要切换到编辑模式下的下拉列表控件中。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 可以单击其中一个控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头），单击**编辑**编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当控件和编辑 UI 可见时，会看到表示确定的谓词，然后单击的按钮**切换 ok 谓词启用**按钮启用或禁用它。When the control and editing UI are visible, you can see the button that represents the OK verb, and click the **Toggle OKVerb Enabled** button to enable or disable it.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

span.span: An that raises the event.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件并破坏区域中的所有 和子控件，以便为网页进入或退出编辑显示模式作准备。

span.span: Raises the event and destroys all and child controls in the zone in preparation for a Web page to enter or exit the edit display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了在基方法的实现类。The method provides an implementation for the base method in the class. 主要目的方法就是准备网页进入或退出编辑显示模式。The main purpose of the method is to prepare a Web page to enter or exit the edit display mode. 方法销毁该区域中包含的所有控件，然后调用基方法，将引发中的事件控件。The method destroys all controls contained in the zone and then calls the base method, which raises the event in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写派生类中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 从派生自定义编辑器区域类，使其可用于在区域模板中的 Web 页的声明性标记。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 自定义类重写方法，将该区域的背景色设置为指定的颜色，然后调用基方法，此操作将破坏所有子和控件以准备进入或退出编辑显示模式。The custom class overrides the method, setting the background color of the zone to a specified color, and then calls the base method, which destroys all child and controls in preparation for entering or exiting edit display mode. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#13)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#13)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以选择**编辑模式**要切换到编辑模式下的下拉列表控件中。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 可以单击其中一个控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头），单击**编辑**编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当控件和编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，您可以看到该区域具有代码中指定的背景色。When the control and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see that the zone has the background color specified in the code.

para.span: 方法可以重写或继承的自定义编辑器区域控件中以编程方式调用类或类。

span.span: The method can be overridden or called programmatically in a custom editor zone control that inherits from the class or the class.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 引发 事件，并在区域中将 集合设置为 ，以便为 控件进入或退出编辑模式作准备。

span.span: Raises the event and sets the collection to in the zone in preparation for a control to enter or exit edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使您可以提供个人时发生的事件的自定义处理控制进入或退出编辑模式。The method enables you to provide custom handling for the event that occurs when an individual control enters or exits edit mode. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写派生类中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 从派生自定义编辑器区域类，使其可用于在区域模板中的 Web 页的声明性标记。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 此自定义类替代方法，设置特定控件的背景色正在编辑，并调用基方法。The custom class overrides the method, setting the background color of the specific control that is being edited, and then calls the base method. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#14)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#14)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以选择**编辑模式**要切换到编辑模式下的下拉列表控件中。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 可以单击其中一个控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头），单击**编辑**编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当和编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，您可以看到所选的控件已在代码中指定的背景色。When the and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see that the selected control has the background color specified in the code.

para.span: 方法可以重写或继承的自定义编辑器区域控件中以编程方式调用类或类。

span.span: The method can be overridden or called programmatically in a custom editor zone control that inherits from the class or the class.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RaisePostBackEvent(string eventArgument) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub RaisePostBackEvent (eventArgument As String)

span.span: A that contains the argument for the event.

summary.span: 执行与某一区域谓词关联的操作，或引发发布回服务器的事件。

span.span: Carries out the actions associated with one of the zone verbs, or raises an event that posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果这些谓词之一在用户界面 (UI) 中单击确定谓词、 取消谓词或应用谓词中，与关联的相应操作执行方法。The method carries out the respective actions associated with the OK verb, the cancel verb, or the apply verb, if one of these verbs was clicked in the user interface (UI). 否则，它会发出一个回发到服务器的事件。Otherwise, it raises an event that posts back to the server.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub Render (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

span.span: The that receives the zone's content.

summary.span: 将区域呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the zone to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写基方法，从类来调用方法，该验证在运行时以 HTML 形式呈现该区域控件的方法。The method overrides the base method from the class to call the method, which verifies that an HTML form is rendered for the zone control at run time. 验证之后，该方法然后调用基方法以呈现区域的完整内容。After the verification, the method then calls the base method to render the full contents of the zone.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderBody(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub RenderBody (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

param.name: writer
param.span: 接收区域的正文内容的 。

span.span: The that receives the zone's body content.

summary.span: 重写基方法，以便呈现某个区域的正文区，该区域从 类派生。

span.span: Overrides the base method to render the body area of a zone derived from the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法将呈现的正文区区域，这是页眉和页脚区域之间的主要内容区域，包含控件。The method renders the body area of an zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains controls. 方法重写基方法中的类以提供专用的呈现的布局和样式属性仅适用于区域。The method overrides the base method in the class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply only to zones. 该方法将呈现包含正文，响应正文的全部内容的表，并在该表中，设置不同的属性值，具体取决于各种条件，包括页上的当前显示模式。The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including the current display mode of the page. 如果有不包含任何控件，它将呈现的值属性。If there are no contained controls, it renders the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写派生类中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 从派生自定义编辑器区域类，使其可用于在区域模板中的 Web 页的声明性标记。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 自定义类重写方法中，添加一个 HTML`
`元素来创建的标头和正文区域之间的直线。The custom class overrides the method, adding an HTML `
` element to create a line between the header and body of the zone. 然后，它调用基方法以呈现区域的正文内容的其余部分。It then calls the base method to render the rest of the zone's body contents. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#15)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#15)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以选择**编辑模式**要切换到编辑模式下的下拉列表控件中。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 可以单击其中一个控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头），单击**编辑**编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当控件和编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到创建的标头和正文编辑器区域之间的行。When the control and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see the line created between the header and body of the editor zone.

summary.span: 呈现在区域级应用的谓词。

span.span: Renders the verbs that apply at the zone level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈现的谓词的操作应用到整个区域: 确定谓词、 取消谓词和应用谓词。The method renders the verbs whose actions apply to the entire zone: the OK verb, the cancel verb, and the apply verb. 在中引用这些谓词， ，和属性。These verbs are referenced in the , , and properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写派生类中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 从派生自定义编辑器区域类，使其可用于在区域模板中的 Web 页的声明性标记。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 自定义类重写方法，将一些文本添加到的现有值为每个区域级别的谓词的属性。The custom class overrides the method, adding some text to the existing value of the property for each of the zone-level verbs. 然后，它调用基方法以呈现的谓词。It then calls the base method to render all the verbs. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#16)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#16)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以选择**编辑模式**要切换到编辑模式下的下拉列表控件中。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 可以单击其中一个控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头），单击**编辑**编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当控件和编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到的文本已更改该区域底部区域级别的谓词的按钮。When the control and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see the text has been changed on the buttons for the zone-level verbs at the bottom of the zone.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function SaveViewState () As Object

summary.span: 将页面发布回服务器之后，保存已发生的所有视图状态的更改。

span.span: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred after a page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 返回区域控件的当前视图状态。

span.span: Returns the zone control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与区域关联的视图状态，此方法将返回 。

span.span: If no view state is associated with the zone, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用基方法，以保存视图状态，并使用应用、 取消和确定的谓词关联的任何视图状态，还将保存。The method calls the base method to save view state, and then also saves any view state associated with the apply, cancel, and OK verbs.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed

summary.span: 跟踪对区域控件的视图状态所做的更改。

span.span: Tracks changes to a zone control's view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法首先调用基方法，以跟踪与相关联的视图状态区域，，然后开始跟踪应用、 取消和确定的谓词的视图状态。The method first calls the base method to track view state associated with an zone, and then begins tracking view state for the apply, cancel, and OK verbs.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property WebPartToEdit As WebPart

summary.span: 获取对当前正在编辑的 控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control that is currently being edited.

value.span: 当前处于编辑模式中的 。

span.span: A that is currently in edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有一个时，并且当控件处于编辑模式，可以编辑控件属性提供对该控件的引用。Only one control can be edited at a time, and when a control is in edit mode, the property provides a reference to that control. 所引用的控件是由引用的控件相同属性。The control referenced is the same as the control that is referenced by the property. 因此，当前正在编辑的控件始终是当前选定。Therefore, a control that is currently being edited is always currently selected.

para.span: 受保护属性是仅在派生类，可以调用基类的此属性可访问类，以获取对当前正在编辑的控件的对象引用。

span.span: The protected property is accessible only in derived classes, which can call this property on the base class to get an object reference to the current control being edited.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
